title: Patch Notes
content: end of the lines in the Monk's Manifestation's overhead dialogue when you interact with Shirra's sarcophagus. Fixed your avatar party members possibly floating mid-air when you enter the Astral Portal after surviving the githyanki ambush at camp at the start of Act III. Fixed several pops and clips in the dialogue at High Hall where your allies commit to supporting you. Fixed several visual bugs, like your character floating above their bedroll, during the first night at the camp overlooking Wyr
